body_html:
The nature of the NUMA extension is becoming more clear.
New functions have been added to the platform interface for NUMA support, that do not yet have an implementation, but will necessarily be platform specific. There's an upcoming change to process_state.cc and some ThreadPool related classes that will optionally enable NUMA specific CPU devices when an implementation of this interface is available.

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/numa.h

It's not possible to include libnuma with TF due to license restrictions. I don't yet know whether we might be able to use hwloc to implement the platform functions for posix environments.
